channel.title: Ok how do i make a npc talk after i made a shop with him?
channel.description: i am wanting to know where to go to add a message to the npc i added a shop with where do i go to do that???[br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2007, 05:41:16 PM[/size][hr]how do i??? anyone

item.title: Ok how do i make a npc talk after i made a shop with him?
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

For this you must know a bit of coding…
Ok first go into NPCHandler.java and search for moo

After the last }
Paste this in.

					if (npcs[i].npcType == INSERT NPC ID HERE!) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "INSERT WHAT YOU WANT YOUR NPC TO SAY HERE";
						}
					}code]

At the INSERT bits put in what it says…

===============================
x0 0wn

Read full topic
